text:
The way the C# compile process works, all files get compiled down to a binary 
in one big go. So you need to be able to pull in all files in one big compile 
task.

Currently you can only specify one source dir, so you cant merge in generated 
code (like a WSDL proxy to an axis server) and coded code, not without keeping 
them in the same source tree, which is bad programming practise.

A nested <src> fileset would do
